name: Q4 High-Value Focus
goal: Target high-NPS agents with declining sales for Q4 boost

name: Retention Champions
goal: Find agents with high retention rates but low cross-sell

name: Growth Accelerator
goal: Identify new agents with strong initial performance

name: Customer Success Stars
goal: Target agents with highest customer satisfaction scores

name: Cross-Sell Champions
goal: Find experienced agents with high policy-per-customer ratio

name: XYZ campaign
goal: Find veteran agents with declining NPS scores for proactive satisfaction recovery

name: Top performers engagement campaign
goal: Create a campaign for mid performing agents of target, with high NPS score.

name: Accomplished Professionals Engagement Campaign
goal: Create a campaign for Accomplished Professionals with moderate performance (4-8 policies sold) and good satisfaction (NPS 9+). Focus on helping them reach their next performance tier.

name: Accomplished Professionals Engagement Campaign2
goal: Create a campaign for Accomplished Professionals with moderate performance (4-8 policies sold) and good satisfaction (NPS 8+). Focus on helping them reach their next performance tier.

name: Accomplished Professionals Engagement Campaign3

name: Mid-Performance Excellence Campaign
goal: Create a campaign for agents with 4-8 years experience, solid performance (8-11 policies sold), and good satisfaction (NPS 7-8). Focus on helping them achieve excellence.

name: Trial Campaign
goal: Create a campaign for Accomplished Professionals with moderate performance (4-8 policies sold) and good satisfaction (NPS 7+). Focus on helping them reach their next performance tier.

name: Trial Campaign
